This is a testharness.js-based test.

[FAIL] fetch() rejects with abort reason
  promise_rejects_exactly: function "function() { throw e }" threw object "AbortError: The user aborted a request." but we expected it to throw object "error1: error1"

  promise_rejects_exactly: function "function() { throw e }" threw object "AbortError: BodyStreamBuffer was aborted" but we expected it to throw object "error1: error1"

  Test timed out
